General.Name: Fuji Finance Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Fuji Finance Indonesia Tbk operates as a finance company in Indonesia. It offers investment finance for various industrial machineries and equipment, such as power plant equipment, heavy equipment, and all types of vehicles; working capital finance; multipurpose finance for procurement of goods or services; invoice factoring services; bridging finance; and finance for green energy projects, such as solar power system. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Fuji Finance Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Indovalue Capital Asset Management Ltd.
